Scenario: Single K‑1 from one in‑state property; no sale
Triggered Forms/Schedules: Schedule E; possible 8582 if loss; 8995/8995‑A if 199A reported on K‑1
Software Cost (link to calc/logic): Use 06 calc: set Num_K1=1; Num_States=1; others FALSE
Notes: K‑1 requires Premium (Online). If passive loss, 8582 limits.

Scenario: Two K‑1s, multiple properties across 2 states; no sale
Why it exists (brief): Investor holds interests in two partnerships across states
Triggered Forms/Schedules: Schedule E; state NR returns; 8582 if losses
Notes: State nonresident returns likely; add state modules.

Software Cost (link to calc/logic): 06: Num_K1≥1; set Has_Sales_1099B=FALSE; capital sale via K‑1
Pro Prep Cost (link to calc/logic): 07: Add Form 4797 line; possibly AMT if PABs
Notes: K‑1 §1231 flows through 4797/Sch D; unrecaptured §1250 at 25%.

Scenario: Installment sale via partnership or direct interest sale
Software Cost (link to calc/logic): 06: No change in tier; cost unaffected
Notes: Partnership reports; investor may have 6252 in certain direct sales.
K‑3 reports items for FTC limitation.
Order: at‑risk, PAL, then EBL per IRS.
AMT when preferences apply (e.g., PAB dividends).
